name: Arko (itch)
description:
One of the best arkanoid that browser sites have seen, a lot of levels, interesting additions to the gameplay and a lot of completely new and different chips, pass the levels, earn points and unlock new stages!

This game is one of the best arkanoids that browser sites have seen, a lot of levels, interesting additions to the gameplay and a lot of completely new and different chips, pass the levels, earn points and unlock new stages! The game also works on mobile devices, play at any time convenient for you! The game is made in its own style and the controls are honed for the most active gaming

What are the goals of the game? They are simple and will be clear to everyone! Your goal is to break the so-called blocks so that you can go further and further through many levels, try to get your cube into buffs, they are presented in the form of multi-colored blocks and give a good addition that will help you pass on
